paper_abstract: Elevator group supervisory control system (EGSCS) is an important and essential component in an industrial elevator system. This paper will introduce particle swarm optimization (PSO) its it heuristic intelligent search method to optimize in real time elevator traffic scheduling solution of EGSCS. The proposed PSO-based scheduling approach will be applied to effectively handle the peak elevator traffic. The overall experimental results will be used to validate its scheduling efficiency and effectiveness.
paper_title: PSO-BASED REAL-TIME SCHEDULING FOR ELEVATOR GROUP SUPERVISORY CONTROL SYSTEM
